segments.text: I can't help but think about all the things that could go wrong here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most obvious danger is that boy falling off the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the clatter of him hitting the floor, perhaps bringing the cookie jar with him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the puddle, growing larger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone, perhaps even the woman, could easily slip and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of a broken bone in such an ordinary setting is quite unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the water damage to those nice cabinets, it's going to be extensive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really dislike seeing things ruined unnecessarily, it's such a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mess from a spilled cookie jar on a wet floor would be absolutely dreadful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could create a truly sticky, grimy situation that's hard to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would intervene before disaster strikes this household.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these small, unnoticed hazards are accumulating, ready to burst.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost unbearable to watch these preventable accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
